random_seed.description: NOTE: This will be overwritten by argparse
random_seed.title: Random Seed

dataset_names.description: List of dataset names for both the SCR and TPP metrics
dataset_names.title: Dataset Names

perform_scr.description: If True, the eval will be Spurious Correlation Removal (SCR). If False, the eval will be TPP.
perform_scr.title: Perform Spurious Correlation Removal

early_stopping_patience.description: We set early stopping patience to probe epochs, so we always train for the same amount.
early_stopping_patience.title: Early Stopping Patience

train_set_size.description: Train set size for each linear probe.
train_set_size.title: Train Set Size

test_set_size.description: Test set size for each linear probe.
test_set_size.title: Test Set Size

context_length.description: The maximum length of each input to the LLM. Any longer inputs will be truncated, keeping only the beginning.
context_length.title: LLM Context Length

probe_train_batch_size.description: DO NOT CHANGE without reading the paper appendix Section 1. The probe's train batch size effects the size of the spuriour correlation learned by the probe.
probe_train_batch_size.title: Probe Train Batch Size

probe_test_batch_size.description: Batch size when testing the linear probe
probe_test_batch_size.title: Probe Test Batch Size

probe_epochs.description: Number of epochs to train the linear probe. Many epochs are needed to decrease randomness in the SCR results.
probe_epochs.title: Probe Epochs

probe_l1_penalty.description: L1 sparsity penalty when training the linear probe.
probe_l1_penalty.title: Probe L1 Penalty

n_values.description: N represents the number of features we zero ablate when performing SCR or TPP. We iterate over all values of N.
n_values.title: N Values

column1_vals_lookup.description: Column1 Values apply only to the SCR metric. Column1 values represents the class pairs we train the linear probes on. In each case, we will create a perfectly biased dataset, such as all professors are males and all nurses are females.
column1_vals_lookup.title: Column 1 Values Lookup

tpp_threshold_2_total_metric.description: TPP metric when ablating the top 2 SAE latents
tpp_threshold_2_total_metric.title: TPP Metric, Top 2 SAE latents

tpp_threshold_2_intended_diff_only.description: TPP decrease to the intended class only when ablating the top 2 SAE latents
tpp_threshold_2_intended_diff_only.title: TPP Intended Class, Top 2 SAE latents

tpp_threshold_2_unintended_diff_only.description: TPP decrease to all unintended classes when ablating the top 2 SAE latents
tpp_threshold_2_unintended_diff_only.title: TPP Unintended Class, Top 2 SAE latents

description: The Targeted Probe Pertubation (TPP) evaluation ablates a set of SAE latents to damage a single targeted linear probe. The methodology is from `Evaluating Sparse Autoencoders on Targeted Concept Removal Tasks`.

eval_id.description: A unique UUID identifying this specific eval run
eval_id.title: ID

datetime_epoch_millis.description: The datetime of the evaluation in epoch milliseconds
datetime_epoch_millis.title: DateTime (epoch ms)

eval_result_metrics.description: The metrics of the evaluation, organized by category. Define your own categories and the metrics that go inside them.
eval_result_metrics.title: Result Metrics Categorized

eval_result_details.description: Each object is a stat on the TPP results for a single dataset.
eval_result_details.title: Per-Dataset TPP Results

sae_bench_commit_hash.description: The commit hash of the SAE Bench that ran the evaluation.
sae_bench_commit_hash.title: SAE Bench Commit Hash

sae_lens_id.description: The ID of the SAE in SAE Lens.
sae_lens_id.title: SAE Lens ID

sae_lens_release_id.description: The release ID of the SAE in SAE Lens.
sae_lens_release_id.title: SAE Lens Release ID

sae_lens_version.description: The version of SAE Lens that ran the evaluation.
sae_lens_version.title: SAE Lens Version

eval_result_unstructured.description: Optional. Any additional outputs that don't fit into the structured eval_result_metrics or eval_result_details fields. Since these are unstructured, don't expect this to be easily renderable in UIs, or contain any titles or descriptions.
eval_result_unstructured.title: Unstructured Results

title: TPP
